text: Kerala Police is a 2008 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Chandrasekharan, starring Kalabhavan Mani and Lakshmi Sharma in the lead roles. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/4555/malayalam/kerala- police/cast.and.crew.htmhttp://www.indiaglitz.com/channels/malayalam/review/9989.html ==Cast== * Kalabhavan Mani * Lakshmi Sharma * Innocent * Suraj Venjaramoodu * Bijukuttan * Madhu Warrier ==References== Category:2008 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Kerala Police (film)
